key.name: sel-keys
key.description: Keys used to select candidate. For example "asdfghjkl;", press 'a' to select the 1st candidate, 's' for 2nd, and so on.

key.name: show-systray
key.description: On: Show Chinese/English and Full/Half shape status as a systray icon Off: Do not show the status icon

key.name: auto-shift-cur
key.description: Automatically move cursor to next character

key.name: clean-buffer-focus-out
key.summary: Clean pre-edit buffer when focus out
key.description: On: Clean pre-edit buffer when focus out to prevent program crash Off: Keep what you already type for convenience

key.name: easy-symbol-input
key.description: Press shift to input Chinese punctuation symbols

key.name: esc-clean-all-buf
key.description: Escape key cleans the text in pre-edit-buffer

key.name: max-chi-symbol-len
key.description: Maximum Chinese characters in pre-edit buffer, not including inputing Zhuyin symbols.

key.name: sync-caps-lock
key.description: Occasionally, the CapsLock status does not match the IM, this option determines how these status be synchronized. Valid values: "disable": Do nothing "keyboard": IM status follows keyboard status "IM": Keyboard status follows IM status

key.name: shift-toggle-chinese
key.description: Shift key to toggle Chinese Mode

key.name: capslock-toggle-chinese
key.description: On: Caps Lock toggle Chinese/English Off: Caps Lock only affect English letter case

key.name: default-english-case
key.summary: Default English letter case (Only effective when Caps Lock toggles Chinese is ON)
key.description: no control: No default letter case. Not recommend if you use multiple keyboards or synergy lowercase: Default to lowercase, press shift for uppercase. uppercase: Default to uppercase, press shift for lowercase.

key.name: plain-zhuyin
key.description: In plain Zhuyin mode, automatic candidate selection and related options are disabled or ignored.

key.name: phrase-choice-from-last
key.description: Choose phrases from the back, without moving cursor.

key.name: space-as-selection
key.description: Press Space to select the candidate.
